forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers this morning with mostly cloudy conditions during the afternoon hours. High 16C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers this morning with mostly cloudy conditions during the afternoon hours. High 61F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy and windy with periods of rain. Low around 10C. Winds SSW at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall may reach 25mm. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy with rain likely. Low around 50F. Winds SSW at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over one inch. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High 12C. Winds SW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High 54F. Winds SW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Low 6C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Low 44F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 12C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High 53F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low 6C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low 43F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. High 12C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High 54F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low near 10C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low near 50F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy at times with periods of rain. High 11C. SW winds shifting to NW at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall possibly over 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy at times with rain likely. High 52F. SW winds shifting to NW at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall may reach one inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 4C. Winds NNW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional rain. Low 39F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High near 10C. Winds N at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High around 50F. Winds N at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low 2C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low 36F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny. High 13C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny skies. High near 55F. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening becoming more intermittent overnight. Low 3C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming less numerous late. Low 37F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. High 11C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. High 51F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear skies. Low 3C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies. Low 37F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with a few showers. High 11C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with a few showers. High 52F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few showers early with mostly clear conditions later at night. Low 3C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the evening, then clearing overnight. Low 38F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the morning hours will give way to occasional showers in the afternoon. High near 10C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later in the day. High around 50F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. Low 3C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 37F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.
